title: Automatic Logins - Riot Read
body:
Can we have Automatic Logins now. It has been 5 seasons almost onto the 6th one and we still have to type a password? If it is on our own personal computer we should be able to have the option where it saves your password too so it can just login. Noone wants to type their password anymore. 

Seriously this will put up attitudes within the community

replies.body:
yep let's make it easier to hack accounts.

Fact is if they remember a login, that login info gets stored somewhere, meaning if someone wanted to get onto your computer and get said login info, they could.

Not to mention are you really complaining about having to put in 5 letters?

Mine is 14 characters.
You're just mad that your password of "clgdoublelift4life" needs to be changed. Get over it.

I doubt the lizard squad is on the hunt for league of legends accounts.

I see riots point, taking account security as seriously as they do... If you where letting someone use your computer they may access and miss-use your account

You are an idiot mate. My password is 5 characters. I just cant be fucked doing it. And it is soooo simple for Riot to put that in. I could do it for them in 20mins LOL but Fortunately I do not work for them
